website_summaries.verdict: This affordable, microwavable heating pad is easy to use, comfortable, and retains heat for a long stretch of time.
pros: Fleece material is soft, which is especially important for those with skin sensitivities
Stays warm for a decent amount of time after only 2 minutes in the microwave
Pad is flexible, allowing users to place it in a precise location
cons: Some users wish this product had more length to it

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it! I have been using it for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! I have been using it for a 2 weeks now and it keeps getting better and better! I had really bad lower back pain and also stress pain in my neck. This heat pack completely took care of them! I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: ayisha rana

customer_reviews.title: Something is rotten in ...
customer_reviews.text: It stinks! Literally. How disappointing. I heated it once for 90 seconds. The smell is something like heated rice kernels that are rotten. Even more than 24 hours later, it still smells bad. The smell is so offensive that I cannot use this product. It isn't returnable, so I guess I will just toss it. Nature Creation kindly offered to send me another one with rice and flax, saying that "The Flaxseed helps lessen the scent of rice", but I don't need another smelly hot pack.
customer_reviews.author: kojo

customer_reviews.title: By far the best heating pad I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: By far the best heating pad I have ever owned. The flexibility alone is a top point but then you add the ease of heating and applying around an injured area and it is a Win-Win! We purchased this in advance of our dog's orthopedic surgery and I am extremely happy with how we are able to fit this around her knee without causing any pain or discomfort. There is an easy "reheat" option but we haven't had to use it yet b/c it retains the heat for quite some time. Once she is healed this will be saved for ourselves should we find the need for it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: DRS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but short
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this hearing pad is amazing! It heats perfect in 1.5 mins and I love the different fabrics for either side but it's so short that you can't comfortably keep this around your neck or back. Unfortunately I can't return it so I use it for when I'm laying down but I did buy their other heating pad (19.99) which is longer and has handles so I'm hoping that works better!
customer_reviews.author: Newell Supur

customer_reviews.title: I still like it, but it doesn't wrap around my neck ...
customer_reviews.text: It's shorter and fatter than it shows in the picture. I still like it, but it doesn't wrap around my neck the way I was hoping it would and the way the picture makes it look like it would. One side is silky and feels dry, the other side is a textured material and feels moist. Works great on stomach and on achy knees, not as good with neck and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Brinson W Crews

customer_reviews.title: works for pain
customer_reviews.text: Got it for pain relief and it works great. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Robert Luca

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware / fraudulent
customer_reviews.text: This is fraud. I have follow the directions as stated and this heating pad only get Luke warm and doesn't stay warm long enough to do anything. I can't even get a refund on a defective item that doesn't work. I got ripped off. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Florence

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I have a lot of pain from neck and lowr back nerve damage. Not only is the weight a comfortable, and soothing. But when I heat it, and place it on a painful area of my body, it allows my joints to move with much more ease. I just bought another pillow and plan to give it to a friend for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S

customer_reviews.title: Smells so bad..unusable!
customer_reviews.text: This thing smells terrible. A cross between mildew and mold. It is unusable. The packaging looks like something you would get a craft show. Not professional at all. I guess if your making these things up in your kitchen there is not quality control. Amazon should not sell this. Waste of money. So you buy this, it's not returnable it's unusable, the seller makes money and you get stuck with a sack of rice you can't even use.
customer_reviews.author: mrsesqaicp

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I received my natural heating pad. I have used it twice now. The directions were clear and concise. The material is very soft and and a comfort. The size is pertfect for my needs on the back of my neck and skull. It is a pleasure to lean back with the warm heat and relieve the stress of the day as I take in a movie or show on TV. The quality is great and it came with a guarantee. Would recommend to anybody looking for soft gentle comfort for their aches, pain and/or tension.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fouchey

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to warm baby’s crib, BUT
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old daughter will not sleep in her crib if her sheets are not warm. I bought this heating pad to lay in her crib while I rock her to sleep. Then I switch the heating pad with baby and she stays sleeping soundly. However, now my 4 year old son has discovered it and will not give it back! I put it in the microwave for 90 seconds and he uses it as a neck pillow in bed. I guess I’ll have to buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: January R

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This hot pack has been a lifesaver for my shoulder injury. The fabric is thick. It’s nice having the hotter side and the felt side that doesn’t get quite as hot. I usually heat it for 2 1/2 minutes to get it hot enough. It great when that time of the month comes around too. It really helps with cramps and stomach aches. I’ve had it for a year and a half. Still in pretty good quality. They’re a couple stains, but it works perfectly. My parents used to have a different brand of hotpacks for 12-15 years. They’re hotpacks we’re falling apart, so I bought these to replace them. These hotpacks will hopefully last them years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have personally only used it as a cool compress. While it is cold the smell is okay. I tried to use it as a warm compress and the smell was so overwhelmingly strong that it gave a few of us headaches. If you can get past the smell, which I'm sure some can, after using it twice the compress itself is leaking? I've used it exactly according to the directions and now it's soaking my shirt, the towel... I'm so sad because the cold worked great for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Stetson Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE YOU CANNOT RETURN IT. This thing is a small odd shape which is too fat. No way to change how much fill is in it without having to yank out the thread and re-stitch it. You cannot put it behind your neck and it is not wide enough to be useful for much of anything. It might work for a sore wrist, but it is even too small for a ankle or knee. I bought the unscented and it smells bad, pretty sure the fill is a bit rancid. Waste of money. I am planning on taking it apart to remove half the filling and maybe put in some herb to kill the smell.
customer_reviews.author: jaber

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Watch what you pay for. The return policy is none existent and product is faulty. If you are looking for a good heating pad, don’t choose this one. There is no movement to the paid, and it forever to heat up
customer_reviews.author: nordygirl

customer_reviews.title: love it as it gets warm after several 1 plus ...
customer_reviews.text: it does the job, love it as it gets warm after several 1 plus minute cycles ( do not want to burn the ingredients) only thing i do not like is that even though I never used it as a cold pack, it still comes out of the microwave pretty damp bottom part that is on the glass tray ( tried using a paper towel underneath) comes out wet So i have to wrap it in a towel in order not to get wet Might want to shake the bag between heating cycled so it will get even heat
customer_reviews.author: not picky

customer_reviews.title: Great Hot Pack
customer_reviews.text: This hot pack works and feels absolutely fantastic! I appreciate how long it maintains heat. One tip: if you ever notice you have a mouse problem in your house, make sure you store your hot pack somewhere the mice cannot get to it.
customer_reviews.author: Srp

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a relatively cheap price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom as a replacement for her old heating pad. It takes a bit longer for it to heat up in the microwave, but the heat lasts longer. It is relatively big, like the size of a small handbag. It was relatively cheap and worth a buy if you are looking to replace a microwaveable heating pad.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Son uses it everyday for his teenage growing pains. He loves it. Pros:It's so much better than the plastic kind with the beads inside, because plastic always breaks and beads come out. We like that's it's bigger than the plastic ones. Option for aromatherapy by adding essential oils. Fluffy side feels better than plastic. Cons: It does smell like rice being cooked, (like cooking oatmeal, if you've never cooked rice before). But he doesn't mind. We haven't bothered getting essential oils to cover the smell because it's really not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: BAGS

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package and saw how small it is, I was disappointed. I tried to return but this item is non returnable (buyer beware). I think that is something that should have been stated. I am now stuck with an item I really don't want. Since I learned yesterday that the bag was non refundable, I gave it a try, it doesn't hold heat more than 15mins. I guess it could be used for your wrist, ankle or maybe if you have little one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, however it was supposed to by unscented. I have a sensitivity to lavender, which can trigger migraines. My migraines are the reason for this purchase, so I’m not happy about the lack of consideration for those truly wanting an unscented product. Other than that, I’m happy with its ability to maintain heat and contour to my body.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Great features
customer_reviews.text: While I love this heating pad, it's smaller than appears in the picture! That said, the two sides are covered in different material, each of which conducts heat a bit differently, so I can turn it over if I want a bit more/less heat--a nice feature. And it's big enough for my intended use. It arrived promptly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Dale

customer_reviews.title: Wet and smells bad
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst! After heating it in the microwave, it feels damp, wet, altogether unpleasant. I do not understand how this can be. Also, when the smell hit you, it is very unpleasant, not at all like lavender, which I love. On top of that, it stained by best ivory sheets blue! If I could give this a -0, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Someone's very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is very pleased with this product. I will probably get the larger companion piece. I bought this for my daughter as she kept taking our warmer and it would disappear until we made her go look for it. Now she has her own warmer, and we have our's back. Everyone's happy, specially the daughter. Good product, good price. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Pat M.

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good one. I wanted to return it within a ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is not as displayed in the photo. It is short and bulky, making it difficult to place on the body. The material does not lend itself to heat well. It is impossible to heat without it getting way too hot. I've used rice bags before. This is not a good one. I wanted to return it within a week of receiving it but the window had closed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbra Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used this heating pad daily for relief of muscle pain around the neck and shoulders. It's also great as a foot warmer. Just the right size for 'over the shoulder' heating pad. Well made and sturdy. Clear and exact instructions for heating and storage. Brochure says that it can be used as cooling pad, which I haven't tried, but I could tell this product was made with care.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great hot or cold!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is such a great cold pack AND heating pad. My 11 yr old son uses it as a heating pad for his growing pains. I use it as an ice pack on my neck for migraines. It really holds temperature and smells soooo good. It’s soft and slightly weighted, which I really like about it. I’m honestly going to purchase more for my house members.
customer_reviews.author: L.W.

customer_reviews.title: Retains heat for a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this heating pad stays hot for a long time. I have another one that has flax seeds inside. This one has rice in it and it tends to hold the heat longer than my other one.
customer_reviews.author: KayMar

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since I've been having some days where I'm super sore after the gym. The product description says that it will have a slight smell to it, so ignore the people that leave bad reviews because they simply can't read. Mine does not stink, nor can I smell it while using it. Also, if you're looking to get this to wrap around your neck, it's definitely not long enough. You can see the size comparison with my dog. Overall, it gets the job done and I'm happy with this product! I would def recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Went through a lot of different heating pad options and ...
customer_reviews.text: Went through a lot of different heating pad options and this is by far the most convenient. The microwave capability saves so much time. Only 1.5 minutes and it heats up!
customer_reviews.author: Akitt

customer_reviews.title: Great option for pregnancy pains
customer_reviews.text: I’m pregnant and dealing with lower back and neck/shoulder pain. This is a really nice portable heating pad so I don’t have to worry about those old style plug in ones that are such a fire hazard. Great moist heat and it stays nice and hot after only 1.5 mins in the microwave. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: dogmombk

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. I particularly wanted a non-electric heating pad, and this is perfect ..... It maintains heat, soft, pliable to any shape, etc. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Pad's Filling is Burnt After Only Two Months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift because his old one was over 5 years old. The reviews on this one sounded good so I purchased it. He heats it up for two minutes at a time to help with back pain. However, after only two months of use the filling inside is entirely burned and smells like burnt popcorn. He heats it as recommended probably 1-3 times per day and it's already done. I cannot believe it only lasted two months. If you have someone who would use this very regularly be aware this item does not handle regular use well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: This size wants to slide off neck or shoulder and not big enough to use on back w/o moving from one area to another.
customer_reviews.author: Woseyjales

customer_reviews.title: Stays warm for hours, works well.
customer_reviews.text: I love this heating pad. It is my second one of this same brand (my dog decided the first one was a fun toy for him to tear apart while I was at work), and I would reorder it again if I needed. It works well, stays warm for hours, and does not have a foul odor previous heating pads I have encountered have.
customer_reviews.author: ajcope

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on my jaw (TMJ). Found that there are numerous uses all over the body. Tendinitis in my shoulder and hip pain. Heats up well in microwave and the weight of the heating pad helps it to stay in place. Highly recommend when you need heat or cold for a small area.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Heating and cooling relief
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is natural, but I have found that it does not perform quite as well other heating/cooling pads. It is still useful though, and it is convenient that it can be used both for heating and cooling. I wondered how moisture build up inside might affect the product, but there have been no signs of mildew or mold building inside.
customer_reviews.author: Spartano15

customer_reviews.title: This is great both hot and cold
customer_reviews.text: This is great both hot and cold. I get headaches that stem from my neck. I heated the pack up and placed it on my neck and my headache went away. I keep it in the freezer at all times so it is cold if I need it to be cold. If I need it hot, I just place it in the microwave. The scent is a little strong for my liking, but it is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: KimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Burnt after just 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these in the mall years ago, and my dog popped it so I needed a new one. Found this and was excited because it was the same size. No scent to it at first, and after first use it smelled like overcooked rice. Then after 3 uses it smelled really really bad. Also, the heat doesn't last long. It's warm for about 5 minutes and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Leyla

customer_reviews.title: Nice heating pad! Don't get it wet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, moldable heating pad that retains heat for at least 20min after heating. Just, don't get it wet! Our cleaning lady accidentally put it in the wash with some blue sheets and it came out super weird and gluey. Won't make that mistake again!
customer_reviews.author: Kitkatkate

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic heating pad!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest heating pad ever! Has two different fabric textures on the different sides. One is thicker - so you can start with that, and as it cools off a bit - you can flip it over and use the thinner fabric side and still get good heat. Three minutes in the microwave - and comfortable relief is at hand.
customer_reviews.author: K. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Best heating pad!
customer_reviews.text: I've gone though so many heating pads. I have IBS and sleep with a heating pad regularly. This is the first one that has lasted longer than two months, I haven't burned a hole in it and it still keeps warm. I love it so much I bought one for everyone in the family so they leave mine alone!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Fields

customer_reviews.title: Unscented ?????  Don't Believe it!
customer_reviews.text: I am so angry at this product. It states very clearly that it is "Unscented," which is precisely why I ordered it. Once opened, the first words that i read, before the itching began, were "essential oils." In spite of what people involved with "essential oils," like to believe, for people who are truly allergic to fragrance, "essential oil" reactions can be among the worst reactions we have. Well, I can return it, but, no. When I clicked for the return policy, it was very clear: 'This item is not eligible for return."
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: After trying so many different, fancy shaped, and priced heating pads, this one wins!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a reasonably priced heating pad that actually holds the heat for a long time! Live the color, feel, and consistent heat it provides. After trying so many different, fancy shaped, and priced heating pads, this one wins!
customer_reviews.author: H.ROBS.79

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Slight smell after heating up though
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and works great. Only complaint is the smell. Kind of wish I would of went with the Lavender scented one if I would of known it would smell a little bad after heating it up. Other than that though it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Rowdy Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced bag of stinky rice
customer_reviews.text: I bought the unscented one & it smells like lavender and moldy rice. Stayed warm for about 10 minutes. Wanted to return product only to realize product is non returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Bamf5

customer_reviews.title: Great product for pre-therapy to loosen the muscles etc.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to loosen the muscles etc. in my shoulder before physical therapy and workouts. This was after shoulder replacement surgery. Follow the directions that come with your heating pad and you should not have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent of lavender! It heats up well and lasts for about 15 mins. The size is ok for the abdomen and pelvic pains.. could work for a shoulder but not for the entire neck. A bigger size is needed for bigger areas. Apart from that it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: H.A.

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for menstrual pain relief. It really only takes 2 minutes to heat and stays warm for about 2 hours. It is also very fast to reheat. I like the smell too, it is not very strong, it is just enough scent to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: Yass!!
customer_reviews.text: God send. Pros and cons though cons: does not stay hot very long, like 5 mins max if you are lucky and I personally am not a fan of the smell. It's not a bad smell or anything obnoxious, I just don't like it. Pros: SO easy to use. I love that it has a smooth side and a felt side. It's got the right amount of padding so you can fold it but at the same time use it on your forehead with enough pressure on it.
customer_reviews.author: sophia franklin

customer_reviews.title: Full of Rice and Flax Seed
customer_reviews.text: This is a good heat pack. It does not stink When heated like others I have had. It does the job. Keep it in the freezer and you will have a cold pack when you need one. Nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: This is my new best friend!
customer_reviews.text: After years of searching for a natural microwavable heating pad in the US (I'm originally from Australia and apparently they are much more common there), I finally found this option by Nature Creation. It is exactly what I've been looking for - I love that it's unscented and the idea of fleece on one side for less intense heat. This holds it's heat for 45 minutes to 1 hour which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cool enough
customer_reviews.text: Read in the FAQ that it could be used as a cooling pad as well. This was the main reason I purchased it. Gets warm very quickly and doesn’t really cool down to a low enough temperature in the first place. Would return the item but amazon won’t allow it. Oh well. Gave it 3 stars because I’m assuming it works as a heating ld well. But I haven’t tried that yet, so being nice with the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as described. so far its been a very good product. Heats up nice and warm and the heat lasts a pretty good amount of time. Its helped with my neck stiffness quite a bit. Some report a smell from the rice but its nothing that bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than expected but it works ok. The material feels good and does not carry a bad odour. However, I just wished it kept the temperature (hot/cold) a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Oyanish

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain
customer_reviews.text: My son was recently diagnosed with a rare from of arthritis. When his foot is hurting we pop this is the microwave and he's instantly relieved. It's the only compress etc that has helped his pain.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for a bag of beans
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have just gone to Walmart to get one of these. its just a bag of some sort of pellets. way over priced in my opinion. But i needed one for my shoulder. Wouldn't buy this again. Id reconsider if it was some kind of new technology but its not.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves it and her go to after tough practice. Works amazing as an heating pad and it actually picked over our others in the house. My husband and daughter are sharing the purple one and he as asked me to get him his own.
customer_reviews.author: Nele

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't heat very well at all
customer_reviews.text: The material is soft but it doesn't heat very well at all. It says you can't overheat and I put it on the maximum time in the microwave and it is barely warm.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Peters

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this... Perfect material and no smelly stuff. Ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Lover

customer_reviews.title: Contents quickly settle and bag feels only partially filled
customer_reviews.text: These are great at retaining heat after just a minute or two in the microwave; however, the contents settle in a short period of time and the bag will feel only partially filled. No way to open and add anything, so no way to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds heat and "molds" to fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have an older one that has separate sections, and I love that this is not divided. The rice inside can be molded to fit your ankle (which is what I use it for) or where you need it. It really holds the heat, which is great. It was so worth the price, I bought a second one to replace my "sectioned" one!
customer_reviews.author: Karen in NH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic... EVERYONE needs this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Perfect size for so many spots on my body to relieve aches and pains. Heating and using right before bed is so soothing and relaxing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Holds heat well, good product
customer_reviews.text: The scent is a little funny because of what it is made of but nothing off putting or bad smell. Just different. Gives great relief and holds heat well and for a long time
customer_reviews.author: abf2224

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Great little heating bad. Has a very weighty feel to it that is nice and a subtle pleasant smell. Warms through just fine and is very soothing to pain.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Day

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: Very useful! When I need heat treatment to loosen tense muscles, 2 min in the microwave is all I need before I turn in. Keeps warm most of the night. When it gets cold outside, provides a nice extra heat source (like a water bottle).
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little bigger than a VHS which is perfect for targeting specific aches. It came with cleaning and heating instructions, which was nice!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: This is saving my life right now!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet relief! This has seriously saved me from the miserable pain in my shoulder from the horrible gas they pump into your abdomen during pelvic surgery! A plug-in heating pad is too flat and has no weight. This is the perfect size to drape over the front of my shoulder. It has a different fabric on each side, depending on how you’re feeling! It has a warm rice smell, that is actually comforting to me. So glad I bought this for post-surgery!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Small Size Perfect for My Dog
customer_reviews.text: my dog had surgery & does PT & this is the perfect size for his little leg. The only issue, Im not sure if this is my microwave or the product, in the same time setting it heats up differently. I'm pleased with the the product.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Lynne

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this thing
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing!! I use it every single day. I pop it in the microwave for 2 minutes and it stays hat/warm for up to an hour. It’s been really cold this year and I take it to bed with me every night and it’s just the best thing ever. I also like the size of it and the fact that there are two different fabrics on the sides. Highly highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiya

customer_reviews.title: Holds heat well
customer_reviews.text: This stays hot for a really long time - it says not to reheat for at least 12 minutes but I use it for 30+. Has a nice weight to it. Initially bought for period cramps, but works great for neck and low back pain as well. As other said it comes out feeling moist but it doesn't feel wet at all.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: ... used it as a hot pack and it works pretty well. It stays warm for about 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it as a hot pack and it works pretty well. It stays warm for about 30 minutes. The problem is that it smells horrible. The one I am using has a chemical/cat pee smell to it that I just can't get past. It smells even worse after heating it up.
customer_reviews.author: Yissa

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This pad heats quickly and holds the heat. It feels good and gives relief from pain. It does have a slight odor, it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: desunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made and packed nicely. Does exactly what it is supposed to. I like that it is suited for various body parts as my last microwave pad didn’t comfortably fit on shoulders. I would order this again. Also USA made is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife, we have an electric one but she doesn't like falling asleep with it on. Got this and it works amazing and no fear if she falls asleep now. Just microwave it for 1:45 and the heat lasts for about 20-30 minutes. It works great for relieving her shoulders and neck. I've used it on my foot and would highly recommend this item to anyone looking for an alternative to electric heating pads.
customer_reviews.author: aaron prischak

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS HORRIBLE. BURNT POPCORN
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE SMELL. Smells like burnt popcorn and we bought the “uncented” version. Purchased 1 week ago and seller will not allow a return. Do not buy this product, and you will also NOT be able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Williams

customer_reviews.title: could have been better designed
customer_reviews.text: The heating of the product is good as described. Only backlog for this one is there is no belt for this one if you want to keep it in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Akash

customer_reviews.title: Provides nice warmth
customer_reviews.text: Packed so full of rice and flax seed that it’s very solid and does not mold comfortably to the neck/shoulder area which is what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Have used a few times so far for sore muscles. Heats up quick, gives off good heat, and doesn't smell bad - the rice smell is pleasant. Heat doesn't last as long as reusable gel packs, but at least you don't have to boil this to reset it!
customer_reviews.author: The Transporter

customer_reviews.title: My Heating Pad Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: The heating pad came in good time, well packaged and as described. I was replacing an old heating pad and I didn't realize how ineffective it was, other than seeds dropping all over the place, until I tried this new one. I was so happy to see how long this pad stays warm,. I microwaved it two minutes and the warmth lasts at least 20 to 30 minutes. It's a really nice product!
customer_reviews.author: floralD

customer_reviews.title: does not stay flat
customer_reviews.text: This ended up being like the ones I have personally made at home. We were hoping it would be flatter and hold that shape when used on the back while sitting in a chair, instead in filling bunched up more toward the bottom. It shipped quickly and was packaged well. Over all, it was not an improvement over the ones I personally made at home.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used
customer_reviews.text: After heating in microwave for 2 minutes does keep warm for 10-15 minutes. Unfortunately mine arrived with the plastic bag opened and the material dirty. Looks like I received a "return". Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: This is just rice in a bag--wasn't disclosed in ad ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just rice in a bag--wasn't disclosed in ad. Put $1.50 rice in a bag--exactly the same thing. Unfortunately, didn't notice it wasn't prime, so there is no return.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: ... less but about a month started leaking stinks real bad anyway
customer_reviews.text: did not less but about a month started leaking stinks real bad anyway
customer_reviews.author: Alicia M. Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Effective and extremely fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Received in under 24 hours from time of order. Helped my wife immediately. Fragrant oat like smell. Heats in 2 mins and remains warm for much longer than expected. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is soft and smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: You can warm it up in the microwave and put it in freezer for a cold pack. It definitely helped my shoulder problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Jones

customer_reviews.title: Comforting
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it for cramps and has found it to be very helpful. She likes that she does not need to plug it in so it can go anywhere with her.
customer_reviews.author: Allison M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell!! Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Totally gross smell. I called to report the issue to manufacturer and see if something wasn’t right about it and it sounded like this is a common problem. It stinks like rotten milk when heated up and made me gag. Don’t buy this. Amazon was amazing when I called and told me it’s it out and gave me a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Kent

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This works great doing heat or cold! I use it mainly for the heat aspect. I initially bought the lavender scented one, but it is pretty strong for awhile & now there is no scent, so I went with the unscented.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Magic!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that works for my cramps. It is also good for the back pain. The only thing I don’t like is the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Best heating pad!!
customer_reviews.text: 2 mins in the microwave and I get so much relief! I loved my first one so much, I bought another: one for my lower back, one for my neck. In love with this product! I recommend it to everyone I can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with these pads that I bought two more. They are the perfect weight and size - one for each shoulder and each ankle. I usually keep a set in my freezer. When I heat up a set in the microwave there isn't any odor. I am grateful to have these ready any time I need a cold or hot pack. Thank you for making these!
customer_reviews.author: D. Rackley

customer_reviews.title: The best for cold toes on winter nights!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the absolute best! It's so simple but works so well. I used to have the hardest time falling asleep in the winter because my feet get so cold but now I just heat this thing up for 2 minutes each night and put it between my feet and I sleep like a baby. I also love to just put it in my lap when I'm watching TV or working at home because it's so cozy. The lavender smells nice too an is quite subtle. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: UU

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Great size and smells superb. Scent lingered on me long after I was done and I loved it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Works well/comfortable.  Smells grainy.
customer_reviews.text: Freeze or put in microwave. I have used it both ways in the same day. Very comfortable and easy to mold to my shoulder and hip. Only thing I don’t like is the grain smell. I tried spraying it with essential oil mixed with water, but that didn’t help.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Not as flexible as shown because of its size.
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for months and have not used it. It is soooo plump, it couldn't possible drape over a shoulder as shown here. Would probably work well if propped up next to the aching body part, but that is not the nature of my needs.
customer_reviews.author: ARcatmom

customer_reviews.title: good product a bit small
customer_reviews.text: the product is very good the bag is just a little bit small. It is too small to fit across the neck
customer_reviews.author: alex demers

customer_reviews.title: Good product! Use it almost every day!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, smells fresh! I have carpal tunnel syndrome and I use this almost every morning to get my hands “going”, feeling a little better and getting them functional. I use this heating pad to increase circulation and then I have cooling pads to decrease inflammation and irritation after heavy use of my hands. I keep it is a zip-lock back in between uses, to keep it fresh and for it not to dry out too much.
customer_reviews.author: JWall

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware - Strong Smell & Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Smells awful (like an animal defecated in it), and after microwaving for 90-seconds (as instructed) yellowish liquid came out near the corner of the product and smelled even worse. Very disappointed that Amazon won’t allow for a refund for this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the mail today and it is just as expected! It heats up super quick, lasts a good amount of time, and is the perfect size. I gave it 4 stars because it does have a "rice" smell to it, which i think smells kinda bad, but its not super strong that i can't use it! Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: My Heating Pad Microwavable for Pain Relief | Moist Heat Pad for Cramps, Muscles, Joints, Back, Neck and Shoulders | Microwave Hot Pack | Heat Compress Pillow | Hot Cold Therapy - Blue
feature_bullets: FLEXIBLE & EASY TO USE - Makes this microwave heating pad a Win-Win as it heats up quickly and molds into every body part, while delivering gentle heat therapy pressure.
TAKE CARE OF YOURSELF - Relief pain and stress and ease sore muscles, lower back pain, sore neck, stomach cramps, achy knees and ankles, etc.
COLD OFFICES & WINTER - Be prepared and stay warm in your cold office and cool whether as this well made heat pack uses Flax and Rice for excellent natural ingredients to Hold Heat.

SPECIAL FEATURES- Super soft fleece on one side to gently hug your skin and provide moist warmth, while the cotton on other side can be used for extra heat retention. Made in USA 🇺🇲, Dimensions: 6 x 11 inches.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
